#summary Download dimensional from Hackage

Library releases from the dimensional project can be downloaded from [http://hackage.haskell.org/ Hackage]. Specific links to libraries below.

== Functional Dependencies ==

These are the stable recommended library versions built using functional dependencies.

  * [http://hackage.haskell.org/package/dimensional dimensional]
  * [http://hackage.haskell.org/package/numtype numtype]

== Type Families ==

These are experimental reimplementations built type families.

  * [http://hackage.haskell.org/package/dimensional-tf dimensional-tf] 
  * [http://hackage.haskell.org/package/numtype-tf numtype-tf]
